title: If I change my name, will that name become available?
body: Was just wondering because I made a smurf with a nice name and now I want that name on my main.

replies.body:
You can send a ticket to support to swap your names between the accounts.
You still have to pay the changes, but at least you don't have the time window.

A couple friends did that years ago - Might be able to find their ticket in order to reference it, if you need to.

I did the same thing, if you rename your main, its old name will become available again. Unless you rename your smurf account with that name. but there is that brief window of availability of both names during the swap of course.
